title: BenCodie
author: BenCodie
created_time: January 31, 2023, 08:56:17 PMLast edit: February 03, 2023, 02:19:08 PM by BenCodie
content: I have read a few posts where web designers and developers are struggling to get clients. So, I thought it would be a good idea to create a thread where anyone with a web design or development firm or portfolio can go ahead and post the URL to either of which. I am sure that it will help those looking to hire and also helping those looking for work. You can post A bitcointalk link to your service thread or a link to your website. You may not promote anything unrelated or offer services without either of these. Adding a URL to your portfolio is a plus, so that I can easily add it to the thread.I will keep the main post updated with the users and the links that they posted. If you use a service provided by anyone in this thread and want to leave them a rating out of 5, I will keep an average rating for the user and their firm/service. List of web design/development services posted in this thread:bitmover|Front-end Web Development|Website|No ANN provided|PM|No reviews yet!Reviews will be added by clients who have posted in this thread. If you are adding a review, please add a star rating out of 5 (e.g 4.95/5) to rate your experience.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: This specific section is for service discussions. There is a separate section for designers and developers to post their services along with their past works, prices, and other details. There is the services board. They could also use the service announcement board. There are also similar boards under altcoins.It is effective that way. They could bump it. They could update it. The thread is also exclusively about the services they offer. They could attract more clients that way. Why would you think promoting their services in a mega-thread will end their struggle to get clients? If you are trying to create a list of services offered, I guess there's already one in existence. If there's none, you can make use of the threads in the services board.

comments.author: Emitdama
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on February 01, 2023, 01:25:47 AMWhy would you think promoting their services in a mega-thread will end their struggle to get clients? If you are trying to create a list of services offered, I guess there's already one in existence. If there's none, you can make use of the threads in the services board. I think what OP is trying to do is to create a list of those offering web designing/developing services with a service rating from past clients to make the decision of choosing the best one for other potential clients easier. There is nothing wrong in that, and it will surely benefit both sellers and buyers of the services if this thread stays active.Unfortunately these days I am not seeing any service provider keep pumping their service topics for years or in other words, no one is staying active for years. Probably bitcoin makes everyone which is the reason people are not focusing on providing services. For same reason, I guess people are not focusing on maximizing their chances by including list of previous clients.
